dragonBalls.description: One-Star Dragon Ball, symbolizes new beginnings.
Two-Star Dragon Ball, symbolizes balance and unity.
Three-Star Dragon Ball, symbolizes growth and development.
Four-Star Dragon Ball, Goku's grandfather's keepsake, symbolizes family.
Five-Star Dragon Ball, symbolizes perseverance and strength.
Six-Star Dragon Ball, symbolizes ambition and dreams.
Seven-Star Dragon Ball, symbolizes completion and miracles.
